text: Yves Censi Yves Censi (born 8 February 1964) was a member of the National Assembly of France. He represented the first constituency of the Aveyron department, from 2002 to 2017 as a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:People from Rodez Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Yves Censi
